verses.verse: "Woe<WH1945> to the shepherds<WH7462> who are destroying and scattering<WH6> the sheep<WH6327> of My pasture!<WH6629>" declares<WH4830> the Lord.<WH5002>

Therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> concerning<WH5921> the shepherds<WH7462> who are tending<WH7462> My people:<WH5971> "You have scattered<WH6327> My flock<WH6629> and driven<WH5080> them away,<WH5080> and have not attended<WH6485> to them; behold,<WH2009> I am about to attend<WH6485> to you for the evil<WH7455> of your deeds,<WH4611>" declares<WH5002> the Lord.<WH3068>

"Then I Myself<WH589> shall gather<WH6908> the remnant<WH7611> of My flock<WH6629> out of all<WH3605> the countries<WH776> where<WH834> <WH8033> I have driven<WH5080> them and shall bring<WH7725> them back<WH7725> to their pasture;<WH5116> and they will be fruitful<WH6509> and multiply.<WH7235>

"I shall also raise<WH6965> up shepherds<WH7462> over<WH5921> them and they will tend<WH7462> them; and they will not be afraid<WH3372> any<WH5750> longer,<WH5750> nor<WH3808> be terrified,<WH2865> nor<WH3808> will any be missing,<WH6485>" declares<WH5002> the Lord.<WH3068>

"Behold,<WH2009> [the] days<WH3117> are coming,<WH935>" declares<WH5002> the Lord,<WH3068> "When I shall raise<WH6965> up for David<WH1732> a righteous<WH6662> Branch;<WH6780> And He will reign<WH4427> as king<WH4428> and act<WH7919> wisely<WH7919> And do<WH6213> justice<WH4941> and righteousness<WH6666> in the land.<WH776>

"In His days<WH3117> Judah<WH3063> will be saved,<WH3467> And Israel<WH3478> will dwell<WH7931> securely;<WH983> And this<WH2088> is His name<WH8034> by which<WH834> He will be called,<WH7121> 'The Lord<WH3068> our righteousness.<WH6664>'

"Therefore<WH3651> behold,<WH2009> [the] days<WH3117> are coming,<WH935>" declares<WH5002> the Lord,<WH3068> "when they will no<WH3808> longer<WH5750> say,<WH559> 'As the Lord<WH3068> lives,<WH2416> who<WH834> brought<WH5927> up the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> from the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714>'

but, 'As the Lord<WH3068> lives,<WH2416> who<WH834> brought<WH5927> up and led<WH935> back the descendants<WH2233> of the household<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> from [the] north<WH6828> land<WH776> and from all<WH3605> the countries<WH776> where<WH834> <WH8033> I had driven<WH5080> them.' Then they will live<WH3427> on their own soil.<WH127> "

As for the prophets:<WH5030> My heart<WH3820> is broken<WH7665> within<WH7130> me, All<WH3605> my bones<WH6106> tremble;<WH7363> I have become<WH1961> like a drunken<WH7910> man,<WH376> Even like a man<WH1397> overcome<WH5674> with wine,<WH3196> Because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the Lord<WH3068> And because<WH4480> <WH6440> of His holy<WH6944> words.<WH1697>

For the land<WH776> is full<WH4390> of adulterers;<WH5003> For the land<WH776> mourns<WH56> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the curse.<WH423> The pastures<WH4999> of the wilderness<WH4057> have dried<WH3001> up. Their course<WH4794> also is evil,<WH7451> And their might<WH1369> is not right.<WH9210>
"For both<WH1571> prophet<WH5030> and priest<WH3548> are polluted;<WH2610> Even<WH1571> in My house<WH1004> I have found<WH4672> their wickedness,<WH9567>" declares<WH5002> the Lord.<WH3068>

"Therefore<WH3651> their way<WH1870> will be like slippery<WH2519> paths<WH2519> to them, They will be driven<WH9083> away<WH1760> into the gloom<WH653> and fall<WH5307> down<WH5307> in it; For I shall bring<WH935> calamity<WH9567> upon them, The year<WH8141> of their punishment,<WH6486>" declares<WH5002> the Lord.<WH3068>

"Moreover, among the prophets<WH5030> of Samaria<WH8111> I saw<WH7200> an offensive<WH8604> thing:<WH8604> They prophesied<WH5012> by Baal<WH1168> and led<WH8582> My people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478> astray.<WH8582>

"Also among the prophets<WH5030> of Jerusalem<WH3389> I have seen<WH7200> a horrible<WH8186> thing:<WH8186> The committing<WH5003> of adultery<WH5003> and walking<WH1980> in falsehood;<WH8267> And they strengthen<WH2388> the hands<WH3027> of evildoers,<WH7489> So that no<WH1115> one<WH376> has turned<WH7725> back<WH7725> from his wickedness.<WH9567> All<WH3605> of them have become<WH1961> to Me like Sodom,<WH5467> And her inhabitants<WH3427> like Gomorrah.<WH6017>

"Therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> concerning<WH5921> the prophets,<WH5030> 'Behold,<WH2009> I am going to feed<WH398> them wormwood<WH3939> And make them drink<WH8248> poisonous<WH7219> water,<WH4325> For from the prophets<WH5030> of Jerusalem<WH3389> Pollution<WH2613> has gone<WH3318> forth<WH3318> into all<WH3605> the land.<WH776>'"

Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> "Do not listen<WH8085> to the words<WH1697> of the prophets<WH5030> who are prophesying<WH5012> to you. They are leading<WH1891> you into futility;<WH1891> They speak<WH1696> a vision<WH2377> of their own imagination,<WH3820> Not from the mouth<WH6310> of the Lord.<WH3068>

"They keep saying<WH559> to those who despise<WH5006> Me, 'The Lord<WH3068> has said,<WH1696> "You will have<WH1961> peace<WH7965> "'; and as for everyone<WH3605> who walks<WH1980> in the stubbornness<WH8307> of his own heart,<WH3820> They say,<WH559> 'Calamity<WH9567> will not come<WH935> upon you.'

"But who<WH4310> has stood<WH5975> in the council<WH5475> of the Lord,<WH3068> That he should see<WH7200> and hear<WH8085> His word<WH1697>? Who<WH4310> has given<WH7181> heed<WH7181> to His word<WH1697> and listened<WH8085>?

"Behold,<WH2009> the storm<WH9370> of the Lord<WH3068> has gone<WH3318> forth<WH3318> in wrath,<WH2534> Even a whirling<WH9123> tempest;<WH5591> It will swirl<WH9123> down<WH9123> on the head<WH7218> of the wicked.<WH7563>

"The anger<WH639> of the Lord<WH3068> will not turn<WH7725> back<WH7725> Until<WH5704> He has performed<WH6213> and carried<WH6965> out the purposes<WH4209> of His heart;<WH3820> In the last<WH319> days<WH3117> you will clearly<WH998> understand<WH995> it.
"I did not send<WH7971> [these] prophets,<WH5030> But they ran.<WH7323> I did not speak<WH1696> to them, But they prophesied.<WH5012>

"But if<WH518> they had stood<WH5975> in My council,<WH5475> Then they would have announced<WH8085> My words<WH1697> to My people,<WH5971> And would have turned<WH7725> them back<WH7725> from their evil<WH7451> way<WH1870> And from the evil<WH7455> of their deeds.<WH4611>
"Am I a God<WH430> who is near,<WH7138>" declares<WH5002> the Lord,<WH3068> "And not a God<WH430> far<WH7350> off<WH4480> <WH7350>?

"Can a man<WH376> hide<WH5641> himself in hiding<WH4565> places,<WH4565> So I do not see<WH7200> him?" declares<WH5002> the Lord.<WH3068> "Do I not fill<WH4390> the heavens<WH8064> and the earth<WH776>?" declares<WH5002> the Lord.<WH3068>

"I have heard<WH8085> what<WH834> the prophets<WH5030> have said<WH559> who prophesy<WH5012> falsely<WH8267> in My name,<WH8034> saying,<WH559> 'I had<WH2492> a dream,<WH2492> I had<WH2492> a dream!<WH2492>'

"How<WH4970> long<WH5704> <WH4970>? Is there<WH3426> [anything] in the hearts<WH3820> of the prophets<WH5030> who prophesy<WH5012> falsehood,<WH8267> even [these] prophets<WH5030> of the deception<WH9652> of their own heart,<WH3820>

who intend<WH2803> to make My people<WH5971> forget<WH7911> My name<WH8034> by their dreams<WH2472> which<WH834> they relate<WH5608> to one<WH376> another,<WH7453> just<WH9201> as their fathers forgot<WH1> My name<WH7911> because of Baal<WH8034>?

"The prophet<WH5030> who<WH834> has<WH854> a dream<WH2472> may relate<WH5608> [his] dream,<WH2472> but let him who<WH834> has<WH854> My word<WH1697> speak<WH1696> My word<WH1697> in truth.<WH571> What<WH4100> does straw<WH8401> have [in common] with grain<WH1250>?" declares<WH5002> the Lord.<WH3068>
"Is not My word<WH1697> like fire<WH784>?" declares<WH5002> the Lord,<WH3068> "and like a hammer<WH6360> which shatters<WH9455> a rock<WH5553>?
"Therefore<WH3651> behold,<WH2009> I am against<WH5921> the prophets,<WH5030>" declares<WH5002> the Lord,<WH3068> "who steal<WH1589> My words<WH1697> from each<WH376> other.<WH7453>
"Behold,<WH2009> I am against<WH5921> the prophets,<WH5030>" declares<WH5002> the Lord,<WH3068> "who use<WH3947> their tongues<WH3956> and declare,<WH5001> '[The Lord] declares.'

"Behold,<WH2009> I am against<WH5921> those who have prophesied<WH5012> false<WH8267> dreams,<WH2472>" declares<WH5002> the Lord,<WH3068> "and related<WH5608> them, and led<WH8582> My people<WH5971> astray<WH8582> by their falsehoods<WH8267> and reckless<WH6350> boasting;<WH6350> yet I did not send<WH7971> them or command<WH6680> them, nor<WH3808> do they furnish<WH3276> this<WH2088> people<WH5971> the slightest<WH3276> benefit,<WH3276>" declares<WH5002> the Lord.<WH3068>

"Now when<WH3588> this<WH2088> people<WH5971> or<WH176> the prophet<WH5030> or<WH176> a priest<WH3548> asks<WH7592> you saying,<WH559> 'What<WH4100> is the oracle<WH9294> of the Lord<WH3068>?' then you shall say<WH559> to them, 'What<WH4100> oracle<WH9294>?' The Lord<WH3068> declares,<WH5002> 'I shall abandon<WH5203> you.'

"Then as for the prophet<WH5030> or the priest<WH3548> or the people<WH5971> who<WH834> say,<WH559> 'The oracle<WH9294> of the Lord,<WH3068>' I shall bring<WH6485> punishment<WH6485> upon that man<WH376> and his household.<WH1004>

"Thus<WH3541> shall each<WH376> of you say<WH559> to his neighbor<WH7453> and to his brother,<WH251> 'What<WH4100> has the Lord<WH3068> answered<WH6030>?' or, 'What<WH4100> has the Lord<WH3068> spoken<WH1696>?'

"For you will no<WH3808> longer<WH5750> remember<WH2142> the oracle<WH9294> of the Lord,<WH3068> because<WH3588> every<WH376> man's own word<WH1697> will become<WH1961> the oracle,<WH9294> and you have perverted<WH2015> the words<WH1697> of the living<WH2416> God,<WH430> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> our God.<WH430>
"Thus<WH3541> you will say<WH559> to [that] prophet,<WH5030> 'What<WH4100> has the Lord<WH3068> answered<WH6030> you?' and, 'What<WH4100> has the Lord<WH3068> spoken<WH1696>?'

"For if<WH518> you say,<WH559> 'The oracle<WH9294> of the Lord!<WH3068>' surely<WH3651> thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord,<WH3068> 'Because<WH3282> you said<WH559> this<WH2088> word,<WH1697>" The oracle<WH9294> of the Lord!<WH3068> "I have also sent<WH7971> to you, saying,<WH559> "You shall not say,<WH559> 'The oracle<WH9294> of the Lord!<WH3068>'"'

"Therefore<WH3651> behold,<WH2009> I shall surely<WH5382> forget<WH5382> you and cast<WH5203> you away<WH5203> from My presence,<WH6440> along with the city<WH5892> which<WH834> I gave<WH5414> you and your fathers.
"And I will put<WH5414> an everlasting<WH5769> reproach<WH2781> on you and an everlasting<WH5769> humiliation<WH3640> which<WH834> will not be forgotten.<WH7911>"
